DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with esomeprazole for 6 months will improve asthma in adult patients with moderate to severe asthma and symptoms of gastroesophageal reflux disease.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study to Determine Anti-Asthmatic Effect of Esomeprazole Magnesium; Nexium Reflux Asthma
DOC.criteria: Adults with diagnosis of asthma since at least 6 months. Symptoms of asthma during runin. At least 3 months history and present symptoms of 1 or more of the following: burning feeling behind breastbone, pain behind breastbone, acid taste in the mouth.
